extendedInfo.description: The insanely popular iPhone app comes to Android...finally!Do you suspect someone is cheating on you?Cheating Spouse/Child Protector app keep you update of your child,wife,sister and lover calls and SMSWhenever your child,wife,sister and lover receive or make a call or get missed calls you will get the instant message with calling/receiving/missed calls number and  duration of the callA copy of all SMS sent or received on your child,wife,sister and lover will be forwarded to youAlso you can set your own passwords. You can set up multipe contact no. on which you want message.This application has the following features to know the details of :1. the incoming calls details2. the out going calls details3. the complete incoming sms forwarded 4. the complete outgoing sms forwarded5. missed calls details6. you can hide this application icon  in the other mobile on whom you are spying on.How to use:This application you have to install in the phone that you wish to track. Once this app is installed  >>Click on application icon.  >>click on "settings"  >>check "enable setting" to use this app(must)Now you can check the remaining option as your requirement  >>If you want to protect incoming calls you have to check "incoming calls" >>If you want to protect out coming calls you have to check "out coming calls"   and so on...  >>If you want to protect all check all check boxes  >>then click on "save" to save your setting  >>click back button to go to previous menu  >>now click on "add contacts"  >>click on "choose" to Select the contact no. from contact list or enter no in which you want to send      the details.   >>click on save  >>click on back button to go to previous menu  >>If you want to hide this app from your phone click on Hide Apps  >>now click on confirm to use default password or click on cancel to set your preferred password.So lets start to keep on the eyes on your kids or your favorite person or any other on whom you want to spy on......In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following âSearch shortcut icon on your home screen, Search shortcut on your bookmarks and browser homepage.This will help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future. You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.
